channel.title: How can I get ::npc to spawn npcs with HP?
channel.description: Title says most of it...What im looking for is someone who can help me make my ::npc command spawn npcs with hp so i can attack them.

item.title: How can I get ::npc to spawn npcs with HP?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Usually this can be edited in the autospawn.cfg.

Or you could make your command append to autospawn its health.

Read full topic
